# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(text, " ")
    wrapped_words = []
    line = ""
    for word in words
        if length(word) + 1 > text_width
            push!(wrapped_words, line)
            line = "\n"
        end
        line *= " "
        line += word
    end
    push!(wrapped_words, line)
    return join(wrapped_words, " ")
end
```
Example:
```
julia> text = "This is a long string that should be wrapped. It should wrap every 10 characters."

julia> wrapped_text = wrap_string(text)
"This is a long string that should be wrapped. It should wrap every 10 characters."
```
